title: Macro Calculator
metaDescription: Free macro calculator - Calculate your protein, carbohydrate, and fat distribution based on your goal. Get your personalized nutrition plan.

activityLevels.extraActive: Extra active (very intense daily exercise or physical job)

info.title: About Macronutrients
info.description: Macronutrients (protein, carbohydrates, and fats) are the nutrients that provide energy to your body. This calculator determines your total daily energy expenditure and distributes calories into macronutrients based on your goal and preferred diet type.
info.formula: Formula: BMR (Mifflin-St Jeor) × Activity Multiplier ± Goal Adjustment
info.limitations: This calculator provides estimates based on standard formulas. Individual requirements may vary. Consult with a healthcare professional or nutritionist for a personalized plan.
